description: Recalculates (u, v, w) and/or changes Phase Center

parameters.info: Name of the input visibility set.
parameters.name: msname

parameters.info: Name of the output visibility set.  (Can be the same as vis.)
parameters.name: output-msname

parameters.info: When applying a phase center shift, modify visibilities only in this/these column(s). Comma separated list
parameters.name: datacolumn

parameters.info: Reference frame to convert UVW coordinates to
parameters.name: refcode

parameters.info: Base UVW calculation on the old values?
parameters.name: reuse

parameters.info: Use this direction as phase center
parameters.name: phasecenter

parameters.info: (experimental) List of the distances (as quanta) of the fields selected by field.
parameters.name: distances
